name: Arthur & Susan: Almost Detectives
description:
Arthur and Susan are the two main playable characters, offering unique perspectives. Decide who speaks and when, as each has their distinct way of tackling challenges.

30 captivating characters, each one with their own tales, motives and secrets. Each one is a puzzle on its own. Each one has a different text font and around 100 combination of body poses and face gestures that we have diligently defined, even if you'll only see a fraction!

More than 100 inventory items, that you will need to watch, use, give or combine in order to solve the countless logical puzzles.



No more straining your eyes! While the game offers a single difficulty, choose to wield the optional magnifying glass, revealing all interactable items in a scene. Say goodbye to pesky pixel hunting - unless you're into that!

An estimated 1000 jokes and puns sprinkled throughout your adventure.

Available in English and Spanish.

Have I said it's a funny, original and cozy point & click indie game?
